column1: tutorial_dialog_1~Our scouts have found the main force of the Orcs at sea. They are preparing to land here. Soldiers
tutorial_dialog_2~Hurry up! We need to build defensive towers.
tutorial_dialog_9~Great tactic! Let Militias stop the enemy. That will help Huntsmans to destroy them easily
tutorial_dialog_11~The Wizards are ready to be upgraded. Let them unleash their power!

column2: Claudia. This battle is a conspiracy of the king. We retreat back now!
Arius. Now help me break the siege! COURAGE
